messages.message: connection_test

I understand you're reaching out, and I'm here to help. Sometimes it's hard to know where to start when we're dealing with difficult feelings.

💙 **I'm here to support you with:**
• Anxiety and stress management
• Depression and mood concerns
• General mental wellness
• Finding professional help
• Coping strategies and resources

Can you tell me a bit more about how you're feeling or what's on your mind today?
i need help

It's a positive step that you're seeking professional support! 

👥 **Our Professional Services:**
• Licensed Mental Health Counselors
• Anxiety & Panic Disorder Specialists
• Depression Treatment Experts
• Crisis Intervention Specialists
• Family & Relationship Counselors

✅ **What We Offer:**
• Confidential sessions
• Flexible scheduling
• Experienced professionals
• Affordable rates
• Both English & Sinhala support

Hello! 😊 Welcome to our Mental Wellness Assistant. I'm here to provide support, resources, and guidance for your mental health journey.

🌟 **How I can help you:**
• Provide emotional support and guidance
• Share coping strategies and techniques
• Connect you with professional counselors
• Offer mental health resources
• Help in both English and Sinhala

How are you feeling today? Is there anything specific you'd like to talk about?

Find support

🏥 **Find Support** - Connect with Professional Help

👥 **Available Services:**
• Licensed Mental Health Counselors
• Anxiety & Panic Specialists
• Depression Treatment Experts
• Crisis Intervention
• Family & Relationship Counseling
• Group Therapy Sessions

✅ **What We Offer:**
• Confidential sessions
• Flexible scheduling
• Both English & Sinhala support
• Online & in-person options
HI

Hello! 😊 Welcome to your Mental Wellness Assistant!

🌟 I'm here to help you navigate our comprehensive wellness platform. I can guide you to:

🏥 **Professional Support** - Find counselors and therapists
📊 **Mood Tracking** - Monitor your daily emotional wellness
🧘‍♀️ **Relaxation Tools** - Meditation and breathing exercises
📚 **Educational Resources** - Articles, stories, and podcasts
🧘‍♂️ **Wellness Activities** - Yoga, digital detox, dream analysis

💬 **How are you feeling today? What can I help you find?**

You can say things like "find support", "relaxation", "mood tracker", or just tell me how you're feeling!

meditation

I'm glad you're looking for resources to support your mental wellness!

🧘‍♀️ **Self-Help Resources:**
• Guided meditation sessions
• Yoga routines for mental health
• Breathing exercises for anxiety
• Self-care tips and strategies

👥 **Professional Support:**
For personalized care and treatment, our professional counselors can provide:
• Individual therapy sessions
• Specialized treatment plans
• Ongoing support and guidance
• Crisis intervention when needed

I'd be happy to help you find the right professional support! 

🏥 **Our Support Services Page includes:**
• Detailed counselor profiles and specializations
• Service descriptions and treatment approaches
• Appointment booking system
• Contact information and availability
• Insurance and payment options

✨ **Why Choose Our Services:**
• Licensed and experienced professionals
• Culturally sensitive care
• Flexible scheduling options
• Confidential and safe environment
• Both online and in-person sessions available

suicide

🚨 **CRISIS SUPPORT NEEDED**

I'm very concerned about you. Your safety is the most important thing right now.

**IMMEDIATE HELP:**
🔴 **Crisis Hotline: 1333** (24/7 Free)
🔴 **Emergency: 119**
🔴 **Samaritans: 0717 639 639**

Please reach out to professional support immediately. You don't have to go through this alone.
